Title: Beneath the Roots
Description:
I am glad to see you are well, $n. I have recently received word that a number of the Aeroknights have taken shelter in a camp close to where the airship was seized in mid-air. 

Would you check on them?
ObjectivesText: Find the camp sheltering the Aeroknights in western Azj'kahet.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find the camp sheltering the Aeroknights in western Azj'kahet.
RewardText: We are doing our best with what we have. The owners of this camp have allowed us sanctuary, but there are no smiles here.
